#  Steve Platt 

Steve was elected to the Bend City Council in 2024.

***

 __Council Position:__ 

4th

 __Term Ends:__ 

2028

## Contact

 *  [Steve Platt](https://www.bendoregon.gov/Home/Components/StaffDirectory/StaffDirectory/609/36?backlist=/government/city-council/steve-platt)   

City Councilor  

   * 541-749-0336
   *  [splatt@bendoregon.gov]() 
 [](https://www.bendoregon.gov/services/advanced-components/staff-directory)  

 ![Steve is of fair complexion with short brownish gray hair.](images/4d177737bfe371656f16ef1b67661cdaf63c74f4a07a2556eb62fa13daeb8bc9.jpg) My public service as both a military officer and educator shapes my vision for a thriving Bend, in both the near term and in building a resilient future for Central Oregon. I am dedicated to serving as a voice for all of Bend as we move forward together. You will find me with my family on the trails, around the lakes and on the rivers of our beautiful community enjoying all that Central Oregon has to offer.

## Education

 *  __UC Davis__ , Science Teaching Credential
 *  __Eisenhower School for National Security and Resource Strategy__ , M.S.
 *  __Air Force Institute of Technology__ , M.S.
 *  __US Air Force Academy__ , B.S.

## Professional and Volunteer Experience

 *  __Physics teacher__ , Bend La Pine Schools
 *  __Retired Air Force fighter pilot__ 
 *  __Budget Committee__ , City of Bend 2023-2024

 *  [## Stewardship Subcommittee](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/city-council/council-subcommittees/stewardship)

 *  [## Summit West Neighborhood District]()
